name: Drifting Shmifting 2
description:
Arrow keys to drive, R to restart.

It's arguably worse than the last one, but at least it's playable. As you can see I'm not very confident. I just wanted to get it out so I could work on other projects that would actually be fun to make, this one was just irritating.

I plan to do one of two things: start a top down shooter, or continue my air combat game. If you're reading this, can you comment which one you'd rather play?
